Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 45th overall pick, by New Jersey in 1980...
Traded from New Jersey to Bay City on 7/7/1980 (Going to NJ: CF J. Castilla. Going to BC: P G. Brito, C W. Armenta, 3B B. Austin)...
Injured on 7/13/1981 with a Fractured Hand, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/22/1981 with a Broken Ribs, out for 5-6 weeks...
